name: Neeko
title: the Curious Chameleon
lore: Hailing from a long lost tribe of vastaya, Neeko can blend into any crowd by borrowing the appearances of others, even absorbing something of their emotional state to tell friend from foe in an instant. No one is ever sure where—or who—Neeko might be, but those who intend to do her harm will soon witness her true colors revealed, and feel the full power of her primordial spirit magic unleashed upon them.
blurb: Hailing from a long lost tribe of vastaya, Neeko can blend into any crowd by borrowing the appearances of others, even absorbing something of their emotional state to tell friend from foe in an instant. No one is ever sure where—or who—Neeko might be...
allytips: You can set her passive to use hotkeys in the options menu. The default is Shift+F1~F5
Try to use Inherent Glamour sparingly, ineffective uses will put enemies on the alert.
enemytips: Standing behind minions against Neeko is very dangerous as Tangle-Barbs become stronger.
Pop Blossom's warning visuals are invisible if Neeko is disguised.

riot_spell_q.name: Blooming Burst
riot_spell_q.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Neeko throws a seed that blooms to deal {{ explosiondamage }} magic damage. If it kills a unit or hits a champion or large monster, it will bloom again, dealing {{ seconddamage }} magic damage. Max 2 extra blooms.

riot_spell_w.name: Shapesplitter
riot_spell_w.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Passive: Every 3rd attack deals {{ passivebonusdamagecalc }} bonus magic damage and increases Neeko's movement speed by {{ passivehaste }}% for {{ passivehasteduration }} second.

Active: Neeko becomes invisible for {{ stealthduration }} seconds and projects a clone that lasts {{ cloneduration }} seconds. Neeko and the clone gain {{ haste }}% movement speed for {{ hasteduration }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Tangle-Barbs
riot_spell_e.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Neeko slings a tangle that deals {{ basedamage }} magic damage and roots for {{ minrootduration }} seconds.

The tangle becomes empowered after hitting an enemy, growing larger, moving faster, and rooting for {{ maxrootduration }} seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Pop Blossom
riot_spell_r.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
After {{ delayuntilreveal }} seconds Neeko leaps into the air. She gains a shield that absorbs {{ baseshield }} damage (+{{ shieldmultiplier }} for each nearby enemy champion).

When Neeko lands she deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and stuns nearby enemies for {{ ccduration }} seconds.

This ability can be prepared in secret if Neeko is disguised.

riot_spell_i.name: Inherent Glamour
riot_spell_i.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Champion combat or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Inherent Glamour
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Champion combat or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Neeko''' is offered a selection of {{tip|champion|allied champions}} to take their appearance. Once selected, there's a {{fd|2.5}} seconds delay before another champion can be selected.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: While disguised, '''Neeko''' can use basic attacks against non-champions while keeping her form. Starting a basic attack against enemy champions, or taking damage from them, or casting either {{ai|Blooming Burst|Neeko}} or {{ai|Tangle-Barbs|Neeko}} breaks the illusion and puts ''Inherent Glamour'' on cooldown.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* '''Neeko''' will copy aesthetics as well as superficial mechanical [[Champion statistic|Statistics]]. She will fake a number of readings:
** [[Health|Health bar]] (original's current amount becomes her apparent maximum)
** [[Manaless|Secondary resource]] - e.g. {{as|mana}}, {{as|energy}} or none at all (original's current amount becomes her apparent maximum)
** [[Champion statistic|Statistics]]
** [[Buff|Buffs]] and [[Debuff|debuffs]] with their respective icons and VFX
** Kill feed icon
*A number of attributes she actually adopts are:
** Default transformation toggle (non-innate)
** Voice lines
** Character interactions (Jokes, taunts, dances, laughs, toggle effects), as well as their [[Recall]]
** Base movement speed
** Attack range (will not adopt longer [[Range|attack range]])

wikia_skill_q1.name: Blooming Burst
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Neeko''' propels a seed into a target area dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to enemies within.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If the seed kills an enemy unit or damages a champion or large monster, it will bloom again after a short delay to deal {{as|magic damage}}. This cannot happen more than twice per ''Blooming Burst''.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling2: {{st|Second and Third Bloom Damage|{{ap|35 to 115}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Maximum Damage|{{ap|70+35*2 to 250+115*2}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}

wikia_skill_w1.name: Shapesplitter
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant '''Neeko''' a stack of ''Shapesplitter'', up to a maximum of two. At 2 stacks, '''Neeko's''' next basic attack deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and grants her {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second, consuming the stacks.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 130}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{as|{{ap|20 to 40}}%|ms}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Neeko''' becomes {{tip|invisibility|invisible}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, sending a temporary [[Champion_summoned_units#Decoys|clone]] of her {{ai|Inherent Glamour|Neeko|current form}} sprinting in the target direction for 3 seconds and up to 900 units away.
wikia_skill_w1.description3: Both '''Neeko''' and the clone gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* The passive part of ''Shapesplitter'' can stack and affect {{tip|turrets|structures}} when '''Neeko''' has more {{as|AP}} than {{as|'''bonus''' AD}}. Otherwise it doesn't.
* The clone travels in the target direction until it runs into terrain.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Tangle-Barbs
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Neeko''' slings a magical spiral in a target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} enemies it passes through.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: If ''Tangle-Barbs'' hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and speed, and the root duration is increased.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Pop Blossom
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Neeko''' {{ct|channel|winds up|cast=true|attack=true|move=true|items=true|spells=true|interrupts=death}} over {{fd|1.25}} seconds, creating a zone around her. The zone is invisible to enemies while she is {{ai|Inherent Glamour|Neeko|disguised}}.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: '''Neeko''' then {{tip|shields}} herself for 2 seconds, increased for each enemy champion nearby, as she leaps into the air for {{fd|0.6}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2: {{st|Shield|{{ap|50 to 110}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Bonus Shield Per Champion|{{ap|40 to 80}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|50+40*5 to 110+80*5}} {{as|(+ 250% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description3: Upon landing, '''Neeko''' bursts with spiritual energy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} nearby enemies for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * {{tip|Stasis}} will not cancel ''Pop Blossom'' and can be activated during the wind up but not during the leap.
